title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Online Learning Behaviors and Social Cognition for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic online learning platform functionalities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their own social cognitive motivation levels (self-efficacy, task value, self-regulation) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can access LXD-based asynchronous video learning materials at least three times weekly and maintain engagement rates above 70%.
Learners can produce five or more monthly learning artifacts applying critical thinking and elaboration strategies in discussion boards.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
